helpText: ng_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ny.

generic.title: ng_Error updating categories__________________________ny
generic.message: ng_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ny.

maxDepthExceeded.title: ng_Error updating categories__________________________ny
maxDepthExceeded.message: ng_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ny.

destinationHasSameName.title: ng_Error updating categories__________________________ny
destinationHasSameName.message: ng_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ny.

noSchema.title: ng_Schema not found_________________ny
noSchema.message: ng_Item schema not found for user_________________ny.

maxCharacter.title: ng_Error updating categories__________________________ny
maxCharacter.message: ng_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ny.

deleteInUseCategory.title: ng_Delete category________________ny
deleteInUseCategory.message: ng_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ny.

custom.title: ng_Custom categories__________________ny
custom.message: ng_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ny.

arcgis.title: ng_ArcGIS categories__________________ny
arcgis.message: ng_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ny.

iso.title: ng_ISO categories_______________ny
iso.message: ng_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ny.

inspire.title: ng_INSPIRE categories___________________ny
inspire.message: ng_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ny.
